verses.verse: <S%H3196>Wine<s%> is a <S%H3887>mocker,<s%> and <S%H7941>beer<s%> is a <S%H1993>brawler.<s%> Whoever is led <S%H7686>astray<s%> by them is not <S%H2449>wise.<s%>
The <S%H367>terror<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is like the <S%H5099>roaring<s%> of a <S%H3715>lion.<s%> He who provokes him to <S%H5674>anger<s%> <S%H2398>forfeits<s%> his own <S%H5315>life.<s%>
It is an <S%H3519>honor<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> to keep aloof from <S%H7379>strife;<s%> but every <S%H191>fool<s%> will be <S%H1566>quarreling.<s%>
The <S%H6102>sluggard<s%> will not <S%H2790>plow<s%> by reason of the <S%H2779>winter;<s%> therefore he shall <S%H7592>beg<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and have nothing.
<S%H6098>Counsel<s%> in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%> is like <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%> but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> will draw it <S%H1802>out.<s%>
<S%H7230>Many<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H7121>claim<s%> to be <S%H376>men<s%> of unfailing <S%H2617>love,<s%> but who can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H529>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man?<s%>
A <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man <S%H1980>walks<s%> in <S%H8537>integrity.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are his <S%H1121>children<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>
A <S%H4428>king<s%> who sits <S%H3427>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1779>judgment<s%> scatters <S%H2219>away<s%> all <S%H7451>evil<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
Who can <S%H559>say,<s%> "I have made my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2891>pure.<s%> I am <S%H2135>clean<s%> and without <S%H2403>sin?<s%>"
Differing <S%H68>weights<s%> and differing <S%H374>measures,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H1571>alike<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
Even a <S%H5288>child<s%> makes himself <S%H5234>known<s%> by his <S%H4611>doings,<s%> whether his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H2134>pure,<s%> and whether it is <S%H3477>right.<s%>
The <S%H8085>hearing<s%> <S%H241>ear,<s%> and the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> even both of <S%H8147>them.<s%>
<S%H157>Don't<s%> love <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> lest you come to <S%H3423>poverty.<s%> <S%H6491>Open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and you shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
<S%H7451>"It<s%>'s no good, <S%H7451>it<s%>'s no good," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H7069>buyer;<s%> but when he is <S%H235>gone<s%> his <S%H1984>way,<s%> then he boasts.
There <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of <S%H6443>rubies;<s%> but the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> are a <S%H3366>rare<s%> <S%H3627>jewel.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H899>garment<s%> of one who puts up <S%H6148>collateral<s%> for a <S%H2114>stranger;<s%> and hold him in <S%H2254>pledge<s%> for a wayward <S%H5237>woman.<s%>
<S%H8267>Fraudulent<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> is <S%H6156>sweet<s%> to a <S%H376>man,<s%> but <S%H310>afterwards<s%> his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2687>gravel.<s%>
<S%H4284>Plans<s%> are <S%H3559>established<s%> by <S%H8458>advice;<s%> by wise <S%H8458>guidance<s%> you <S%H6213>wage<s%> <S%H4421>war!<s%>

He who goes <S%H1980>about<s%> as a <S%H7400>tale-bearer<s%> <S%H1540>reveals<s%> <S%H5475>secrets;<s%> therefore <S%H6148>don't<s%> keep company with him who <S%H6601>opens<s%> wide his <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
Whoever <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother,<s%> his <S%H5216>lamp<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%> in <S%H380>blackness<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
An <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> quickly <S%H926>gained<s%> at the <S%H7223>beginning,<s%> <S%H1288>won't<s%> be blessed in the <S%H319>end.<s%>
<S%H559>Don't<s%> say, "I will <S%H7999>pay<s%> back <S%H7451>evil.<s%>" Wait <S%H6960>for<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and he will save <S%H3467>you.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8441>detests<s%> differing <S%H68>weights,<s%> and <S%H4820>dishonest<s%> <S%H3976>scales<s%> are not <S%H2896>pleasing.<s%>
A <S%H1397>man<s%>'s <S%H4703>steps<s%> are from <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> how then can <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> his <S%H1870>way?<s%>
It is a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to a <S%H120>man<s%> to make a <S%H3216>rash<s%> <S%H6944>dedication,<s%> then <S%H310>later<s%> to <S%H1239>consider<s%> his <S%H5088>vows.<s%>
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2219>winnows<s%> out the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and <S%H7725>drives<s%> the threshing wheel over <S%H212>them.<s%>
The <S%H5397>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H5216>lamp,<s%> <S%H2664>searching<s%> all his <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts.<s%>
<S%H2617>Love<s%> and <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3678>safe.<s%> His throne is <S%H5582>sustained<s%> by <S%H2617>love.<s%>
The <S%H8597>glory<s%> of young <S%H970>men<s%> is their <S%H3581>strength.<s%> The <S%H1926>splendor<s%> of old <S%H2205>men<s%> is their gray <S%H7872>hair.<s%>
<S%H6482>Wounding<s%> <S%H2250>blows<s%> <S%H8562>cleanse<s%> away <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H4347>beatings<s%> purge the <S%H2315>innermost<s%> <S%H2315>parts.<s%>
